column4: not quite Ubuntu but:  I can only get ubuntu to run in Raid mode on my Vostro 200, is it possible to install vista in raid mode and do I risk damaging my hdd if I do?
daisuke:  You having troubles with Dell Ubuntu install?
daisuke:  I'm a total novice to Ubuntu, but I want to give it a blast on my Vostro 200. Having a heck of a time though.  Hardy does not like Dell (or dell doesn't like hardy ;)
